xz42_bb26.client.model

Class ChatAppMainModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • xz42_bb26.client.model.ChatAppMainModel

  • public class ChatAppMainModel
extends java.lang.Object
    The model class, which stores a list of rooms the local user currently joined, the stub of the local user on the registry, etc
    Author:
    bb26, xc7

        public IInitUser connectTo(java.lang.String ip)

        Returns:
        An instance of IUser which represents the remote user

        public void deleteChatroom(java.util.UUID id2)
        Delete the room associated with certain ID from the list of rooms
        Parameters:

      • chatWith

        public void chatWith(java.lang.String ip)
        Connect to the RMI Registry at the given remote host, and grab the stub from that registry. Then create a local chatroom with the remote user represented by the given IP address, and inform the remote user to create a local chatroom
        Parameters:
        ip - The remote IP address to connect to.

      • createNewRoom

        public void createNewRoom(IInitUser friend)
        Locally create a new chatroom and invite the remove user to join
        Parameters:
        friend - The remote user

      • joinRoom

        public void joinRoom(IChatroom rm)
        Upon given a chatroom to join, create a local chatroom and add existing users in the given chatroom into the local chatroom. Then broadcast to users in remote chatroom to add my stub into their local chatrooms.
        Parameters:
        rm - the remote chatroom to join

      • getFriendChatrooms

        public void getFriendChatrooms(java.lang.String ip)
        Send a room list request to remote user
        Parameters:
        ip - The IP address of the remote user
